page.title: 05Ghosts in Beverstone Castle.
page.content: There is a strong tradition that Beverstone castle is haunted.The ghost of a monk has been seen in the Berkeley Chapel.Servants who lived in the main house adjoining the castle have claimed to hear voices and music drifting from the ruins during the night.On one occasion,the butler heard so much noise that he became convinced that somebody was in the ruins.This was unlikely as the only access was from the house.When he went to investigate he found that all of the rooms of the castle were completely empty!
